A total stepback from the laggy-hitboxed gem CS:S. The game could probably benefit from a new engine, but denialists dare not speak down to their favorite franchise as long as it stays a cash cow for Valve. Don't play this outdated piece of garbage, play any other FPS that has came out in the last 5 years and save yourself the time.
Good FPS game. Try it and you will believe it.
Melhor jogo já feito na história da humanidade. Quem discorda é BOT!

I RECOMMEND IT

I downloaded the game Counter-Strike: Global Offensive recently and decided to play it (out of boredom, so to speak). Very delayed, easy gameplay, simple layouts, easy mechanics.

The game is very simple to the banal. There are two teams of 5 people. You choose a card and play for one of the sides (terrorists or special forces). The game is played up to 16 wins by one of the sides. At the beginning of each game, you can buy the weapons that you get the most good at playing with.
